topic.title: ACTIVITY TREATMENT FUNCTION CODE (DECISION TO ADMIT)
topic.shortdesc: ACTIVITY TREATMENT FUNCTION CODE (DECISION TO ADMIT) is the TREATMENT FUNCTION CODE of the SERVICE to which a PATIENT is to be admitted.
